ygData.subject: Re: Guk expedition -ToNite-Friday
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually not any race. No gnome or halfing pls. They will really make me look bad and i can t jio all those chio elven babes  Btw, no problem if ya below
ygData.messageBody:
Actually not any race. No gnome or halfing pls. They will really make me look bad and i can't jio all those chio elven babes <G> Btw, no problem if ya below level 10, i know of a place there to camp, with about 3 frogs ranging level 5-10.
-----Original Message-----

To: sg-everquest@onelist.com <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, June 18, 1999 6:27 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Guk expedition -ToNite-Friday


I'm worse of then you, only level 6, but still going :)
